website_summaries.verdict: A reliable wireless design in a sleek style.
pros: These wireless over-ear headphones pack a great sound and are comfortable to wear for long periods
The reliable battery can hold a charge for a long time
cons: A few customers experienced lagging sound, and these headphones are a bit too big for some

customer_reviews.title: Good..but lags
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit and sound is great. Lasts days without charging. However Bluetooth lag is substantial with Netflix and other streaming services. Maybe it's operator error, but I can't get that fixed. It's only a little but very noticeable. Otherwise it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Share bottom is annoying
customer_reviews.text: Microphone suck, whenever I answer a call while playing music won’t automatically play the music after I cut the call and the share button for another Bluetooth headphone is very sensitive(annoying) and it keeps sliding out my ears
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: My son has had these for over a year now and no issue. He has plenty of other big name headphones but these are always his go to.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: I had to download an update but the JBL web site and their chat personnel worked with me and now they work perfectly. I got them at a good price and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane  Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel on Ears
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and great sound! They fit great and work great. Best part no wires.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a day
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day I got them would not charge. Light would not turn on and charge the battery
customer_reviews.author: ari neiman

customer_reviews.title: Buying these headphones was the best decision I made this year
customer_reviews.text: Buying these headphones was the best decision I made this year. I wear these for hours and don't feel any discomfort. The battery lasts forever and only takes a few hours to charge.
customer_reviews.author: s.b. adamus

customer_reviews.title: IF IT GOES DEAD, TRY A LONG 12 HOUR ChARGE
customer_reviews.text: It went dead, dead, dead after eight months. Bought a new cable. Tried different power sources which tech support suggested. Finally gave it a 12 hour charge and it came back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Steven MS.

customer_reviews.title: Very large & bulky
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that these wireless headphones are much much larger then I expected. Please note; Consumer Reports rates as very good quality sound for a better price than Beats. I don't own a pair of Beats so I can't really compare the sound quality. I have tired on a pair of Beats and these are large and bulky in comparison. Like headsets from the 70's. The price is lower by almost half compared to Beats. Personally; I wish I would have just spent the extra money and gotten the Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Package was easy and simple
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of using. It still works really good and I recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Hervert

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I have ever owned and the Bluetooth feature makes then even better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick and the price is reasonable. Headphones worth buying too, they sound astounding
customer_reviews.author: OTA

customer_reviews.title: More for less than Beats.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing and "beats" Beats sound. Beats costs $300 and the JBL costs $200. A no Brainer.
customer_reviews.author: A Satisfied Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Break Too Easy
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sounded great until they broke... I hadn’t even owned them 3 months and then the audio stopped coming out of the right ear. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Giffin

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Best quality headphones , I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Toomey

customer_reviews.title: Great but HEAVY on head
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth earphones, noise cancelling, nice big ear pads, love the sound, and I use frequently for taking conference/work calls -does a great job of switching bw music and incoming/dialing. Main drawback is they get VERY heavy on my head after wearing for extended time frame, and it's uncomfortable and requires an adjustment/taking them off for a while to give myself a break.
customer_reviews.author: A. Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever bought or had all around mid ...
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever bought or had all around mid and high bass is really good the lows not so much but i am happy with it because i wanted headphones that performed good in the most ways possible not just a bass dominated genre and these superceded my expectation
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound, the bass is awesome, best headphone EVERest!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed I sold my beats and bought these thinking they ...
customer_reviews.text: Significant lag on the audio! I'm disappointed I sold my beats and bought these thinking they would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria O.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions too difficult to read and understand. Markings on set hard to read. Returned it and purchased Bose35.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Used Not New
customer_reviews.text: This product was to be new and was obviously used. The tape holds the box in was already cut. Then when you open the box to headphones the tape inside was already cut...
customer_reviews.author: Klcopela

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work when I got it out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Dalton J Surmeier

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Crisp sounding with good sound balance, these phones have a good balance of bass mids and treble. I travel 90% of the year and these are my go to sets with their 25hr battery life. Leave on Monday and come back Friday with no recharge needed. I'm thoroughly satisfied with the quality of build. My beats fell apart after 2 months, monsters lasted a bit longer before the cushions ruptured. I've had these for 6 months now, still going strong! Bestbuy rep recommended these over Beats, which I had been fed up of and they haven't disappointed at all! Great sound, excellent battery life, solid build quality
customer_reviews.author: Loxion

customer_reviews.title: Headband is cheap plastic that will crack
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of this product is incredible. I got them on sale at best buy. Unfortunately a few months later something came loose in the left earcup and began rattling in the earcup. I received a replacement from JBL. A few months later the headband cracked. The headband is made out of a cheap plastic. I will reach out to JBL and see if they will honor their warranty with the second pair of headphones that broke.
customer_reviews.author: YukioJ

customer_reviews.title: If you need low latency these are not for you.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and easy to connect to BT but the latency is so bad you can't use them for TV or play music. Play a note and you hear it about a half a second later. Supposed to be an update to fix this but tried two different sets of headphones and neither one would take the update. Still working with Harmon support which is great but they just can't solve the problem. I guess another set goes back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bartee

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant cans - if you can find them
customer_reviews.text: Closed back over ear cans that seriously block external sound. Quick pairing, great sound and *deep* bass. Very good at isolating you in a high noise (office, house with 4 kids) environment. Surprisingly wide soundstage, microdynamics through all out metal are equally well reproduced. I snagged a set off W00t! - if you can find them, get them!
customer_reviews.author: Will England

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the everest 700 for about 2 years, I also own MANY other headphones. These are great sounding and have not failed in 2 years of me owning and using them... what else do you need ?
customer_reviews.author: 60ndown

customer_reviews.title: It lags!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good however it does lag pretty bad when watching videos, I knew that before I bought it but I read in the answers that a firmware update fixed it so I thought it was an easy thing to do. Here’s the trick I couldnt find the update not on their website or somewhere else and I tried contacting their support and they kept giving me links to other useless data for example they sent me a link a link to download the spec sheet!! Although my question was very clear. Probably the last time I’d buy a jbl headphones
customer_reviews.author: Mazen S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...But they don't last.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing when they work. I've had mine for over a year and the sound which is adjustable through the app can be amazing with a few tweaks but it does suck that it won't switch over to your settings halftime until you go into the app. I had a fully charged headphone die after one use of 15 mins. Ugh and the durability is a little questionable with the plastic side.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Take care of them they last and sound great for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 3 years ago when they were best buy exclusive. They I'm still amazed how nice they sound. Nice and loud,bass is leveled out. After 3 years they stay charged for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenjetsu

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, ANC is very good but not as good ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them at BestBuy. The app works for me and there are regular updates with ANC improving over time. The sound is great, ANC is very good but not as good as Bose QC25/35. Unfortunately, the Bose broke two times after 1 year each. The only downside is the comfort. They are quite firm, so you may try them out first.
customer_reviews.author: Schimmel

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday headphone.
customer_reviews.text: The wrap around ear piece is comfortable and fits nice and snug. Connects fairly fast to my phone via Bluetooth. It's nice using the app to customize the EQ. But with that said, I do wish that the headphones had a little deeper base and that the overall volume would go louder. The ambient noise feature is fun to play around with too.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but there's a delay when utilizing the Bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today. Great sound but there's a delay when utilizing the Bluetooth with video. Sonically they're better than the Bose (which I had to replace THREE TIMES), but the delay is a cause of concern. I may have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound quality. Just need to update the firmware to resolve the audio lag. Exceptional headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Osho

customer_reviews.title: Good Bass but volume needs to be turned up past ...
customer_reviews.text: Good Bass but volume needs to be turned up past mid level to appreciate. I struggle to hear the separation in the mids. Need an EQ or DAC to resolve. Overall the price was right for the sound. The Stream quality certainly should be high. These are better than average everyday work/ casual listening headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi S

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, Dre.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. This was a semi-impulse buy at the big box store. The sound range is amazing; highs are crisp and very high. The bass is rich, but not overpowering. I have the 700 wireless model, not the elite. Extremely comfortable and noise cancellation is better than average. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is best I have ever heard in a pair of headphones. However, that being said the bluetooth function is SUPER finicky. My volume will mute itself and when I turn it back on it mutes itself again. Just recently my right headphone stopped working. So. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great, love the sound and the bass! got it in time with even 1 day early
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but disappointing features
customer_reviews.text: Sound amazing, I'm annoyed that 1) there is a delay when using Bluetooth and watching a video 2) the share button is annoying when you accidentally press it and it pauses your music 3) you can't use the app with the normal Everest headphones, you have to have the Everest Elite, which is dumb
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Unfotunatily bad headphones
customer_reviews.text: I buy it from . best buy 169 usa + 12 tax ! Good headphones. But not perfect After 3-4 months used / BAD headphones n BAD quality
customer_reviews.author: Tariq

product_meta.title: JBL Everest 700 Wireless Bluetooth Around-Ear Headphones (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackLegendary sound brought to a new standard:

Enjoy comfort, freedom, and the best sound around with JBL Everst 700. Bluetooth 4.1 enables wireless connectivity, legendary JBL Pro Audio Sound provides a dynamic listening experience, and sculpted ear cushions allow for unprecedented fit, and comfort around your ears. With a rechargeable battery offering 25 hours of performance and ShareMe 2.0 to wirelessly share music, videos and games, now you can dance alone or with a partner free from limits. A built-in microphone also allows for easy call access.

Features:

Bluetooth 4.1: Connect to any Bluetooth-enabled device for amazing sound quality without the hassle of wires. Legendary JBL Pro Audio Sound: Enjoy the same elevated experience and incredible sound JBL has been delivering to concert halls, studios and living rooms for almost 70 years. Best-in-class Ergonomics: These headphones are ergonomically designed to fit the unique contour of your ears. You’ll experience unprecedented comfort. Listen longer and enjoy it more. ShareMe 2.0: Only JBL enables your friend’s Bluetooth headphones to connect with yours; share your music, videos and games – easily and wirelessly. Built-in Microphone: Enjoy more natural sounding voice calls with a built-in microphone with echo cancellation technology.

What’s in the box:

 * 1 pair of JBL Everest 700 headphones
 * 1 Micro USB charging cable
 * 1 Audio cable with 3.5mm jack
 * 1 Quick Start Guide
 * 1 Warranty and safety note
 * Aha Radio Information Sheet
 *
feature_bullets: Bluetooth 4.1: Connect to any Bluetooth–enabled device for amazing sound quality without the hassle of wires.
Legendary JBL Pro Audio Sound: Enjoy the same elevated experience and incredible sound JBL has been delivering to concert halls, studios and living rooms for almost 70 years.
Best–in–class Ergonomics: These headphones are ergonomically designed to fit the unique contour of your ears. You'll experience unprecedented comfort. Listen longer and enjoy it more.
ShareMe 2.0: Only JBL enables your friend's Bluetooth headphones to connect with yours; share your music, videos and games – easily and wirelessly.
Built–in Microphone: Enjoy more natural sounding voice calls with a built–in microphone with echo cancellation technology.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars66 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
